By小新
首发论坛:https://srcbbs.com/
	——250530
请不要修改以上注释

视频每天好像只能看10次，需要开vip才能一直看
搜索规则：
一共有视频，图片，漫画，小说四个选项，除小说外想搜什么选项就在要搜的内容后面加上@选项，小说不用加
例：
想搜索视频内容《台北娜娜》就在搜索框输入"台北娜娜@视频"
想搜索小说《逆天邪神》就直接在搜索框输入"逆天邪神"就行

ruleContent.content:
<js>
let result=result;
let content1;

var na=source.bookSourceComment;

var ra=java.base64Decode('QnnlsI/mlrAK6aaW5Y+R6K665Z2bOmh0dHBzOi8vc3JjYmJzLmNvbS8=');

if(na.includes(ra)){
   
//小说
if (baseUrl['match'](/pid=1/)){
	 content1=java['getString']('html@body@script@html');
	 var urlMatch = result.match(/url:\s*'([^']+)'/g)[1];
if (urlMatch && urlMatch.length > 1) {
    var ajaxUrl = urlMatch.match(/url:'(.*)'/)[1];
    }
    g = url =>java.ajax(url);
    let content = java.getString("p@text",g(ajaxUrl));
content;
	}
	
			//图片
	else if(baseUrl['match'](/pid=2/)){
	 content1=java['getString']('body>[class="container"]@img@html');
	 }
	
				//漫画
	else if(baseUrl['match'](/pid=3/)){
	 content1=java['getString']('body>[class="container"]@img@html');
	 }
	
	//视频
	else if(baseUrl['match'](/pid=0/)){
let pic=java.get('pic');	content1=java['getString']('body@script.-1@all');
let url=content1.match(/url: "(.*)",/)[1];
if(url){
	java.startBrowser(url,chapter.title)
java.toast('正在加载视频\n视频加载较慢，请耐心等待')
' 【刷新正文】或【点击章节链接】跳转播放\n不要相信且不要点击视频里的任何广告，🔗直链:\n'+url+pic
	}
else{
	'本站每日限量观看10部视频，您今日的次数已用完，您可以分享继续观看或者12小時候後播放次数恢复再看，也可以登录VIP专线继续观看。'+pic
	}
	}
   
   
   
   }
else{	java.base64Decode('6K+35LiN6KaB5L+u5pS55L2c6ICFLOivt+S4jeimgeebl+a6kA==');
	}



</js>
@js:java.t2s(result)

searchUrl:
<js>
if(key.match(/@视频/))
{
result='https://www.europeli.com/search?pid=0&keyword={{key.split("@")[0]}}&page={{page}}';
}

else if(key.match(/@图片/))
{
result='https://www.europeli.com/search?pid=2&keyword={{key.split("@")[0]}}&page={{page}}';
}

else if(key.match(/@漫画/))
{
result='https://www.europeli.com/search?pid=3&keyword={{key.split("@")[0]}}&page={{page}}';
}

else 
{
result='https://www.europeli.com/search?pid=1&keyword={{key}}&page={{page}}';
}


result
</js>
@js:result+",{\"webView\": true}"

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
            
var document = JsDom.parse(src);
            
// 获取包含<li>元素的<div>元素
var divs = document.select('ul.list > div');

// 将divs转换为数组以便排序
var divArray = [];
for (var i = 0; i < divs.size(); i++) {
    divArray.push(divs.get(i));
}

// 按照data-id属性对divArray进行排序
divArray.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.attr('data-id'), 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.attr('data-id'), 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});

var list = [];
// 遍历排序后的divArray
for (var i = 0; i < divArray.length; i++) {
    var div = divArray[i];
    var dataId = div.attr('data-id');
    // 获取当前div下的所有<li>元素
    var lis = div.select('li');
    for (var j = 0; j < lis.size(); j++) {
        var li = lis.get(j);
        var a = li.select('a').first();
        if (a != null) {
            list.push({
                text: a.text(),
                id: dataId, // 使用data-id属性
                url: a.attr('href')
            });
        }
    }
}

//java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

<js>
var lis="";
//获取所有dd标签，依次存入数组arr
var aDiv = java.getElements("@@.content@dd");
    var arr = [];
    for(var i=0;i<aDiv.length;i++){
    	        arr.push(aDiv[i]);
    }
//按data-id属性值升序排列arr中的元素
    arr.sort(function(a,b){return a.attr('data-id') - b.attr('data-id')});
//依次拼接排序后arr中的元素
    for(var i=0;i<arr.length;i++){
    	lis=lis+arr[i];
    }
    lis
    //java.log(lis)
</js>

<js>
let id = result.match(/\{siteid:'(\d+)',bid:'(\d+)',cid:'(\d+)'\}/);
if (id) {
    let body = "siteid=" + id[1] + "&bid=" + id[2] + "&cid=" + id[3];
    let path = "novelsearch/chapter/transcode.html,";
    let option = {
        "method": "POST",
        "body": String(body)
    };
    java.ajax(String(source.bookSourceUrl + path + JSON.stringify(option)))
}

.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　🔸最近更新：' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + og('description').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|分享书籍.*|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
url:og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var lis="";
//获取所有dd标签，依次存入数组arr
var aDiv = java.getElements('dd');
    var arr = [];
    for(var i=0;i<aDiv.length;i++){
    	        arr.push(aDiv[i]);
    }
//按data-id属性值升序排列arr中的元素
    arr.sort(function(a,b){return a.attr('data-id') - b.attr('data-id')});
//依次拼接排序后arr中的元素
    for(var i=0;i<arr.length;i++){
    	lis=lis+arr[i];
    }
    lis
</js>dd@html

ruleContent.content:
<js>
let regex = /var c="([^"]*)"/;
let dd = result.match(regex)[1]

let j = java.base64Decode(dd);
  //java.log(j)
  jja=String(j).replace(/^[^-]*-/,"-")
  if(/=/.test(jja)){jj=jja.replace(/=[^=]*$/,"");}else{jj=jja.replace(/_[^_]*$/,"");}
  
m=jj.replace(/-/g,"PHA+").replace(/_/g,"8L3A+");
n=java.getString("@@.read-content@p!0@html");
n+	java.base64Decode(m)
</js>

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}##最新章节:
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

{{@@[property$=chapter_name]@content}}
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))

ruleContent.content:
<js>
try{
form=java.getElement("#content label")
txt=java.getElement("#content [class=001] p")
while (form!=""){
	code=String(java.getString("strong@textNodes",form)).trim()
	java.log(code)
	result=java.ajax(`${baseUrl},{"body":"captcha=${code}","method":"POST"}`)
	java.setContent(result)
	form=java.getElement("#content form")
	}
b64=result.match(/atob\('([^']+)'\)/)[1]
if(result.match(/'aes'\s*===\s*'aes'/)){
	key=result.match(/CryptoJS\.enc\.Base64\.parse\('([^']+)'\)/)[1]
	
	txt+=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/ECB/Pkcs7Padding", java.base64DecodeToByteArray(key)).decryptStr(b64)
	}else{
		txt+=java.base64Decode(b64)
		
		}
result=txt}catch{result="\n这章正文不存在！！！\n换一章！！！\n或者\n换本书！！！\n或者\n换源！！！"}
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
var cf=/_cf_/.test(src);
if(cf){
	cookie.removeCookie(source.getKey());
	var x=java.get("url");
	b=java.startBrowserAwait(x,
		"验证");
	//b=java.webView(null,x,null)
	//b=java.ajax(x)
	result=b;
	}
		result;

</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var bes = result.match(/PHA\+[A-Za-z0-9+\/]+={0,2}/g);
//java.log(String(bes))
if (!bes) {
    var ml = java.webView(null,baseUrl,null);
    var txt = java.getString("#txt@html");
    java.longToast("正文解密失败，转为webView动态加载。");
} else {
var result = [];
for (var i = 0; i < bes.length; i++) {
    // 遍历数组，使用阅读内置Base64解码方法
    var bsej = java.base64Decode(bes[i]);
    var txtt = String(bsej);
    result.push(txtt);
      }
	var txt = result.join('\n');
}
txt;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
//java.log(baseUrl)
result = java.getElements(".xs_info.-1@ul@li@a").toArray();
let start = 0;
let end = 0;
try {
 start = src.match(/li:nth-child\(\d+\){display:none}/gi).length;
 end = src.match(/li:nth-last-child\(\d+\){display:none}/gi).length;
} catch (err) { }

result = result.slice(start, result.length - end);

result
</js>
ruleToc.chapterName:
text@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

<js>
cookie.removeCookie(source.getKey());
url = "https://m.cqgmp.com/api/search";
r = java.ajax(baseUrl);
s = r.match(/var\s\w+\s*=\s*"\w+";/g).join('');
eval(s);
//java.log(s)
var bd = {
  "method": "POST",

};

bjson = JSON.stringify(bd);
url + ',' + bjson;
</js>
